snippet: Idarica Gazzoni derives her whimsical decorative motifs from a wide array of culture and eras, including 17th-century Russia and 19th-century Japan.
lead_paragraph: Idarica Gazzoni derives her whimsical decorative motifs from a wide array of culture and eras, including 17th-century Russia and 19th-century Japan.

headline.main: For This Italian Fabric Designer, Fantasy Comes in Patterns
